resources.string: IRON STILL ON? KEEP YOUR COOL

Get the most out of appliances and electronics like lights, TVs, fans, washers, dryers, wall A/C units and more with the WEMO Insight Switch. Once you download the free WEMO App to your mobile, you can turn any plugged-in device on or off, monitor energy usage, and set-up customized notifications from here, there, and anywhere.
